page.title: 01INTRODUCTION W.CHILTINGTON
page.content: In our village our roads have no speed limits or lights. Also you can't enter the village without going up or down a hill. West Chiltington is quite big but lots of new houses have been built in our playing areas. For instance down {Nyetimber}there used to be a big wood which was nice to play in and feed the horses. But a firm wanted to buy the land the horses were moved and all the trees were knocked down by a digger, one of the biggest in the world. Some weeks after that when they started to build the houses there was much more light on the road. Our{church}up the village has the second most important{wall paintings in England. I like W.Chiltington for its {countryside and farms.}It has a lot of {fields and wildlife}all around.
